oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Glen Knable interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Glen Knable served in Vietnam in the USAF January 1969 to December 2001. He co-piloted a C-7A (refueling plane), and was an assistant commander and instructor pilot. This interview was conducted Sept. 9, 2020, by Billy Minser and Ed Caudill
